"Staggy": "Hey! You made a wise choice coming to Central. Welcome!"
"We fight, we win, and we earn, until our gear is top of the line. This is where dreams are made, friend!"
"You say you want some knowledge that'll be useful in combat?"
"You ready for this? Listen up. Weapons... can be combined!"
"They're called \"Multi-Weapons\" and yes, they're just as awesome as they sound. Wanna try makin' one?"
"Multi-Weapons can be made at, you guessed it, the Item Lab."
"You can combine any two weapons that share the same brand line--Prim with Prim, Resurge with Resurge, et cetera."
"Oh, but you'll need ore and minerals to act as the catalyst. Don't forget!"
"But wait, there's more! I'll give you those ores and minerals, just this once, on the house. Now get on over to the Item Lab!"
"Obtained Photon Quartz x20 and 50000 <pict reb_meseta> Meseta."
"Obtained Photon Quartz x2 and 200 <pict reb_meseta> Meseta."
"Well? How's it feel to make your very own Multi-Weapon?"
"I dunno what it is, but there's just somethin' beautiful about combining, you know?"
"Not to mention, combining two weapons pretty much doubles your attack options! Whew, what a rush!"
"Now get out there, try out different combinations, and make some truly next-level weapons!"
